text: This is a list of Brazilian television related events from 1994. ==Events== *17 July - Brazil beat Italy 3-2 on penalties to win the 1994 World Cup at Pasadena, California in the United States. ==Debuts== *9 May - Castelo Rá-Tim- Bum (1994-1997) ==Television shows== ===1970s=== *Turma da Mônica (1976–present) ==Births== ==Deaths== ==See also== *1994 in Brazil
title: 1994 in Brazilian television
